author: Elena Botella, Maxwell Strachan
title: The American Disaster Relief System Is Broken
description: As U.S. federal agencies prepare to help families survive the coronavirus disaster, Hurricane Harvey’s lower-income survivors offer a warning of what can go terribly wrong.
content:
For 26 months after Hurricane Harvey, Doris Browns house was uninhabitable. At least, it was by the standards most people would apply, if not according to the FEMA assessor who had taken a look at it. 
Her living room ceiling had a three-foot-wide hole where… [+24472 chars]
